Name: zul-iqembulezifundi
Author: Iqembu Lezifundiswa, Mussa Muhammad Telela , Uthman Mfanafuthi Msomi, Moulana Abdur Rahman Chilipa, Haji Ibrahim Mondli Japhet Mthembu, Moulana Imran Ngcobo, Moulana Eshaaq Osman
Source: Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa(IDM), https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Akekho oyongena kuwona ngaphandle koyisoni kakhulu
Lowo onikela ngengcebo yakhe ukuze azihlanze
Futhi akukho ngisho nakoyedwa kuyena emseni ukuze anikezwe wona
Ngaphandle kokufuna ubuso beNkosi yakhe, ephakeme kakhulu
Futhi ngempela impilo ezayo ingcono kuwena kuneyamanje
Futhi ngempela iNkosi yakho izokunika ukuze uthokoze
Futhi yakuthola untula umpofu yabe seyiyakunothisa
Asizange yini sikunwebele (sikuvulele) isifuba sakho na
Ngakho-ke uma usuqedile (umsebenzi wakho) sukuma (uphinde uthandaze)
